issue.title: [C++] IWYU docker image silently fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4564](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4564). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[ARROW-4528](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4528) silently removed `iwyu` from the list of installed packages. The `iwyu_tool.py` does _not_ propagate errors correctly if `iwyu` binary is not found. This seems to be resolved in more recent version, which will be addressed in [ARROW-4340](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4340).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4564?focusedCommentId=16767885) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
The absence of the include-what-you-use binary is addressed in my patch for ARROW-4340. It would be nice to improve the script to not fail silently
